explanation: [0-0] A little boy with short hair, wearing a green shirt, is standing in front of a microphone, his mouth wide open and his eyes closed. The background behind the boy is green.

[0-2] As a beautiful singing voice flows from the little boy's mouth, the background lights dim. During this time, the little boy raises his left hand and sways it slowly to the rhythm of the song, his eyes still closed.

[0-2] As a beautiful singing voice flows from the little boy's mouth, the background lights dim. During this time, the little boy raises his left hand and sways it slowly to the rhythm of the song, his eyes still closed.

[2-9] Then the little boy opens his eyes and stops singing. The camera zooms out, showing the little boy standing on the stage, laughing and looking forward, excitedly jumping in place. His hands wave up and down continuously. At the same time, a celebratory party popper emoji appears above the boy's face in the upper part of the screen.

[9-15] Immediately, the camera cuts to the judges' table, with the audience sitting to the right of the judges. At this time, all the judges at the table stand up. The camera pans left, focusing on a woman with long hair in a long green dress and a man with short hair in a yellow shirt, both running quickly towards the stage area where the little boy is standing. As the screen changes, the little boy in the green shirt on the stage jumps up slightly. He first claps his hands with the person on the left side of the screen and then claps with the person on the right. Then, a woman with long hair squats down with a smile and excitedly hugs the little boy.
